description.value: The worm that walks Strides, ending its movement sharing a space with a creature, and deals piercing damage to the creature equal to [[/r {1d8}[piercing]]]{1d8 piercing} plus an additional 1d8 for every 3 levels the worm that walks has. The creature can attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:|basic:true|name:Squirming Embrace] save with a DC of the worm that walks's spell DC - 2.
